para: The management module deals with the human processes of setting up a TuXlab. The first section deals with the procedures that need to be followed when applying for a TuXlab, and an overview of the installation process. The second section deals with the aspect of "Change Management", presenting information regarding executive buy-in, the computer committee, the idea of "clustering", and using a TuXlab to bring services to the greater community. The third section deals with the process of management after a TuXlab has been installed and is in use. This information includes discussion and examples regarding reporting, training, budgeting, and involvement in the incentive scheme.
